Articles.Content:
Dunno why but I thought I'd make a simple ship that could go anywhere in the Kerbol system and that's less than 50t at launch. Here it is...

The first jet stage will get you pretty high, then the next couple of stages will get you to your favorite orbit with dV to spare. The payload ion stages have 12k dV and so will let you take a tour to anywhere that grabs you.

Wouldn't take much tweaking to add a Kerbal or some science stuff if you like.

Craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/fr4gn9t8l9t4n85/Jool%20ion%20mission%204.craft?dl=0
